title: Literature Analysis: Character Development and Motivation

vocab.definition: How a character changes and grows throughout a story
The reason why a character acts or behaves in a certain way
The main character in a story
The character or force that opposes the main character
A quality or characteristic that describes a character's personality

teachingNotes: Use character maps and graphic organizers. Analyze how characters change from beginning to end. Discuss internal vs. external conflicts that drive character development.
